name: ExtensionEnglandContentStability
title: Extension England Content Stability
description: An extension to describe the stability of content referenced by a DocumentReference.
purpose: This extension extends the DocumentReference to support the exchange of information representing the stability of content referenced.

element.short: The stability of content referenced by a DocumentReference.
